definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: doubtful word; hand-clapping, i.e. mockery (?) (cf. vb. Job 27:23);—[[שָָׂפֶק]] Job 36:18 in difficult cl. ´[[כִּי־חֵמָה פֶּן־יְסִיתְ ְבְשׂ]] because there is passion, (beware) lest it incite thee to mockery, Bae:Kau Da (but [[הסית בְּ]] = incite against, hence Bu reads [[לִשְׂפּׂק]]); De is not clear; others (as Di): lest it (passion) excite thee at the chastisement (v. √
; cf. Thes); Du reads [[מִשְׂפָּק לְחֵמָה]] lest chastisement incite thee to wrath.—On Job 20:22 (edd.) v. [[שֵׂפֶק]]. p.974
